content: *k7 k2tog * 4 times k1 now 34sts total on needle 1 turn to the ws purl side there was one remaining last stitch unknitted row 2 sl1 p31 leaving again 1 stitch unworked at the end and turn sock to the rs knit side row 3 sl1 k30 this leaves 2sts unworked at the end and turn sock to the ws purl side row 4 sl1 p29 you are turning at the last stitch before the gap row 5 sl1 k28 turning the stitch before the gap row 6 sl1 p27 turning the stitch before the gap continue the knit and purl sides slipping 1st and turning work at the stitch before the gap ending on… row 22 sl1 p11 turn you will have 11 unworked sts on the left side and 11 unworked sts on the right side of your purl sts the heel now needs to be worked back and forth closing the gaps that have been created from turning the work row 23 sl1 k10 k2tog this is 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap knitted together m1k stitch in the stitch under the k2tog stitch *please see diagram a turn work to ws purl side row 24 sl1 p11 p2tog again 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap purled together m1p stitch in the stitch under the p2tog stitch **please see diagram b turn work to rs knit side row 25 sl1 k12 k2tog m1k row 26 sl1 p13 p2tog m1p continue in this manner k2tog or p2tog the 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap together and then m1k or m1p in the stitch under the k2tog or p2tog stitch and turning until… row 42 sl1 p33 turn row 43 *k8 m1l* 4 times k2 increasing 4sts there are now 38sts on needle 1 then rejoin cc and working back in the round continue knitting the colourwork chart using needles 1 and 2 4 pattern copyright charlotte stone stoneknits 2019 for personal use only *diagram a where to pick up the **diagram b where to pick up the stitch stitch for m1 for the short row heel after for m1 for the short row heel after a p2tog a k2tog foot - knit the foot using the colourwork chart pattern until you are 4cms 1 5 inches before the desired length of your sock and ending on a row of the chart that is knit in only one colour so either row 4 8 12 16 etc - cut all colours except the colour that will be your toe in the sample this is cc3 continue to knit with only this colour small size only *k9 k2tog * repeat until 2sts before the end of the round k2 6sts decreased 60 sts in total medium size only *k7 k2tog * repeat until end of the round 8sts decreased 64 sts in total large size only *k6 k2tog* repeat until 6 sts from the end of the round and
